__e: You can tell me absolutely anything, but you're hiding something.
I told you that I would know if you were telling the truth, but I also know if you're hiding something from me.
Unless you're just covering up for her so you can use it against us later.
You're doing nothing to hide your revulsion towards me, but there is nothing in the world I enjoy so much... as a challenge.
And you need to hide the cat because the captain's coming through.
Where'll you hide it, if need be?
But if you don't give me my money, then I will tell the police that you hid money from them.
You hide your head in your books, and the answer you're looking for is staring you in the face.
They saw you fight. How you're hiding your face.
Then why hide behind the mask of...
Some of what you're hiding behind your back.
And you make me sick the way you're hiding behind my baby!
You're hiding behind him, but he's not what you think he is.
And now you hide behind this wolf who owes you nothing.
I don't like it when you keep things from me.
You don't trust me? When you hide things from us, it makes it a little difficult to trust you.
But when you are keeping things even from your own department why are you telling me?
You don't have to hide your hand from me.
You don't trust me? When you hide things from us, it makes it a little difficult to trust you.
But when you are keeping things even from your own department why are you telling me?
Whether it's you keeping secrets from me, or you, Grayson, having sex with all of my friends.
You hide my clothes, I' m wearing everything you own.
I like how you don't hide your problems like everyone else.
